MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Wickham Close, Belle Vue Road and surrounding area. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area earlier today and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site continuing to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1pm on Jan 23, 2021
